Name: Legal case
Description: A legal case is a legal action brought before a court of law.

Properties.Name: Citations
Properties.Description: Legal citations for this case. This is a machine-readable string. Enter one citation per row.

Properties.Name: Court
Properties.Description: The court in which this case was heard.

Properties.Name: Judges
Properties.Description: The judge or judges who sat on this case.

Properties.Name: Subject
Properties.Description: The broad subject matter of the court case, eg. abortion, discrimination, taxation
